raw_body: PERERA,​ N.V.G. (Gnana) – Royal College,​ Colombo (Retired Teacher),​ Beloved wife of Late K.R.Perera (Rtd. Dy. Controller,​ Department of Immigration & Emigration),​ Loving Mother of Geetha,​ Ransiri (Singer Sri Lanka PLC),​ Mother- in- Law of Deepika (Universal College of Learning),​ Grandmother of Jayampath and Oshani passed away. Remains lie at 32B,​ Wijeyaba Mawatha,​ Nawala Road,​ Nugegoda. Cortege leaves residence on Thursday,​ 28th December 2023 at 4.15 pm for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 5.30 pm.084924
